original_text: Abel was the first to die like this and Zechariah was the last. They even killed Zechariah in the yard of the temple, near the altar. Yes, God will punish the people who are alive today for all those murders.
korean_text: 곧 아벨의 피로부터 제단과 성전 사이에서 죽임을 당한 사가랴의 피까지 하리라 내가 너희에게 이르노니 과연 이 세대가 담당하리라

sentences.original_text: Abel was the first to die like this
sentences.korean_translation: 아벨은 이렇게 죽은 첫 번째 사람이었고

sentences.original_text: They even killed Zechariah in the yard of the temple
Yes, God will punish the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 하나님은 그 사람들을 벌하실 것이다
